text.text: THE FLAME OF THE FIRST EAST ASIAN GAMES WILLBE FETCHED FROM THE EAST SEA
第一届东亚运动会圣火取自东海海面
Ms Wang: Come and look at this piece of news.
王小姐:来看看这条消息。
Mr.Lee:(read)The flame of the First East Asian Games willbe fetched from the East Sea.
李先生:(读)第一届东亚运动会圣火取自东海海面。
Ms Wang: I don't know whyit must come from the East sea.
王小姐:我不知道圣火为什么要取自东海。
Mr.Lee:Maybe we can findthe answer in the article.
李先生:或许我们能在正文中找到答案。
王小姐:我们往下看看吧。
